issue.title: Current Sensor_TEST fails without a display

content.raw:
Right, as a Singleton I also believe than destructor is not (and can not be) called until the end of both tests.

Calling ```Fini()``` at the end of the test seems to solve the problem of  messages not being generated. I started the issue_621 branch for this and running the test in gazebo-any in jenkins.

UPDATE: After calling Fini() some error messages start to appear which will need further investigation:
```
 Error [SensorManager.cc:330] Unable to remove sensor[default::hokuyo::link::laser] because it does not exist.
```
content.html:
Right, as a Singleton I also believe than destructor is not (and can not be) called until the end of both tests.

Calling Fini() at the end of the test seems to solve the problem of messages not being generated. I started the issue_621 branch for this and running the test in gazebo-any in jenkins.

UPDATE: After calling Fini() some error messages start to appear which will need further investigation:

 Error [SensorManager.cc:330] Unable to remove sensor[default::hokuyo::link::laser] because it does not exist.
